channel.title: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband" - Got an extra from the PH...

item.title: Re: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
Re: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
Re: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
item.content:encoded: Well since you're offering, how about a Necklace of the first HoCage for the Headband?

item.title: Re: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
item.content:encoded:
I thought I was pretty straight forward (1 K-Dog's Headband for trade, because I had an extra). *shrug*

Nonetheless, I edited my first post with Bucket Lists. I'll run through it and clear out the non-tradeable items at a different time.

item.title: Re: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
Re: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
item.content:encoded: well it would be good if you tell us what you have =P

item.title: Willing to Trade K-Dog's Headband
item.content:encoded:
My alt, Arietta, won 2 K-Dog's Headbands from the Prize Wheel â€” I only needed one. Thus, I'm putting the second up for trade.

I'm not expecting much for it, but I'd prefer an item that would give me some Range/Strength. Anything that can increase Appetite is good too.

Also, if people are interested, I'm willing to go item hunting with my main, Aeonis. *shrug*

EDIT: Here's what I have in the Buckets of Aeonis and Arietta:

Aeonis' Bucket: (NOTE: Narrowed down to items that can be traded.)
Ashen Film: 1
Broken Spyglass: 1
Crumbling Minerals: 8
Curdled Powder: 1
Filtered Thread: 8
Holy Arrow: 1
Kunai: 4
Medicinal Herbs: 5
Potion Base: 1
Shogi Piece: 1
Shuriken: 1
Silver Petals: 4
Tangled Metal: 2
Tasty Tonic: 2

Permanent Items:
Swallowtail Butterfly (1)

Arietta's Bucket: (Note: I don't have much because I kinda sold everything to waste spend on the Party House.) (NOTE: Narrowed down to items that can be traded.)

Crumbling Minerals: 4
Dog Treats: 1
Food Pills: 1
Power Flower: 1
Tasty Burger: 6
Tasty Tonic: 1
Wasteland Dust: 4

Permanent Items:
K-Dog's Headband (1)

Everything that's on there (except for what can't be traded, of course, because I don't have the time to sift through my Buckets and check if each individual thing is tradeable) is up for grabs. And, I repeat, I'm not expecting much when it comes to offers.
